title: Who’s More Motivated Than KD and Kyrie?
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss what the Lakers and LeBron are likely discussing behind closed doors this offseason. It’s looking like KD and Kyrie will stay in Brooklyn. Derek Jeter addresses the gift basket rumor… but do we believe him? Trevor Lawrence had great things to say about Doug Pederson, but he’s really saying more about Urban Meyer. PLUS, Conor McGregor is living his best life and Jalen feels inspired on a Friday afternoon!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
